label: logicB:agriculture_en
steps: [1] If the field is plowed, then the soil becomes loosened.
[2] If the soil is loosened, then the seedbed is suitable.
[3] For any seed lot x, if x is treated with fungicide, then x is protected against seed-borne pathogens.
[4] If the seedbed is suitable and seed lot a is protected against seed-borne pathogens, then the crop establishes well.
[6] Seed lot a is treated with fungicide.
[7] The seedbed is suitable and seed lot a is protected against seed-borne pathogens.
